STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Revolutionize your grocery shopping experience with our all-in-one app
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create and manage multiple shopping lists with ease. Our intuitive interface helps you organize your grocery needs efficiently.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Quickly add items to your list by scanning product barcodes. Save time and ensure accuracy in your shopping.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Compare prices across different stores to find the best deals. Save money on your grocery shopping with our real-time price updates.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Plan your meals and automatically generate shopping lists. Streamline your meal prep and grocery shopping in one place.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Keep track of your home inventory. Get notifications when it's time to restock essential items.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Receive tailored product suggestions based on your shopping history and dietary preferences. Discover new products you'll love.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our grocery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the grocery app work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to browse, select, and order groceries from local stores. Simply create an account, choose your items, and schedule a delivery or pickup time that suits you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is there a minimum order amount?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The minimum order amount may vary depending on the store and your location. You can check the specific requirements during checkout.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How long does delivery usually take?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Delivery times typically range from 1-3 hours, depending on your location and order size. You can also schedule deliveries in advance for a time that's convenient for you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, you can modify or cancel your order within a certain timeframe after placing it. Check your order status in the app for specific options and deadlines.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Are there any fees for using the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: While the app is free to download and use, there may be delivery fees or service charges depending on your order and location. These will be clearly displayed before you complete your purchase.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Grocery App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the grocery delivery process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Simply browse our app, add items to your cart, choose a delivery time, and check out. Our shoppers will carefully select your items and deliver them right to your door at the scheduled time.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are there any minimum order requirements?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We have a small minimum order value to ensure efficient deliveries. The exact amount may vary based on your location, but it's typically around $30.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, you can modify or cancel your order up until the shopper begins selecting your items. Simply go to your order details in the app to make changes or cancel.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if an item I want is out of stock?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our shoppers will do their best to find suitable replacements for out-of-stock items. You can set your preferences for substitutions in the app, or opt to have the shopper contact you about alternatives.
